name: irish-dictionary
title: Irish Dictionary
description: Searches various Irish dictionaries for the provided word.

commands.name: search-focl-ir-ie
commands.title: Search Foclóir.ie
commands.description: Retrieves a translation from Fócloir.ie, the New English-Irish Dictionary
commands.subtitle: Translate from English to Irish

commands.name: search-teanglann-ie
commands.title: Search Teanglann.ie
commands.description: Retrieves a translation from the available dictionaries on Teanglann.ie
commands.subtitle: Translate bi-directionally (better from Irish to English)

commands.name: search-abair-ie
commands.title: Search Abair.ie
commands.description: Retrieves the pronounciation of an Irish word from abair.ie, which provides all dialects.
commands.subtitle: Retrieve audio with dialects

commands.name: search-focl-ir-corpus
commands.title: Search Foclóir Corpus
commands.description: Searches the Foclóir Corpas (Foclóir Corpus), a collection of over 30 million Irish language texts. Requires an account to access.
commands.subtitle: Search the Foclóir Corpas

preferences.name: corpas-username
preferences.title: Corpas Username
preferences.description: The username of your Corpas account

preferences.name: corpas-password
preferences.title: Corpas Password
preferences.description: The password of your Corpas account

preferences.name: language
preferences.title: Language
preferences.description: The language the extension is in

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
